definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: It was many years before the government officially apologized for mistreating Japanese-Americans.
sentences.chinese: 这是很多年前的政府正式对虐待日裔美国人道歉。

sentences.english: Many Japanese-Americans served with honor in the United States armed forces.
sentences.chinese: 许多日裔美国人服务与荣誉的美国军队。

sentences.english: Many Japanese-Americans lost their jobs after the attack.
sentences.chinese: 事件发生后，许多日裔美国人失去了工作。

sentences.english: The drawings show what life was like during the forced move and detainment of Japanese-Americans.
sentences.chinese: 该图显示什么被迫生活在移动和日裔美国人被扣留等。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
pinyin: Dao4 ge2 la1 si1 · Mai4 ke4 a1 se4

definition: Fujimori (Japanese surname)/Alberto Ken'ya Fujimori (1938-), president of Peru 1990-2000
Ishihara Jintarō (1932-), Japanese author and politician, governor of Tokyo since 1999
